select deliverer.* from ent_deliverer deliverer where deliverer.sys_status = 1
and concat(deliverer.name,deliverer.delivery_lines,deliverer.phone) like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(deliverer.modified_time),0,deliverer.modified_time) desc,deliverer.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ent_deliverer ( id, name, delivery_lines, phone, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{name}, #{delivery_lines}, #{phone}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_deliverer set name = #{name}, delivery_lines = #{delivery_lines}, phone = #{phone}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_deliverer set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
